name: words-n-numbers
description: Tokenizing strings of text. Extracting arrays of words and optionally numbers and emojis / emoticons from strings. For Node.js and the browser. When you need more than just [a-z] regular expressions.

scripts.test: npm run empty-sandbox && standard --fix "./index.js" "./test/*.js" && npm run compile-for-browser && tape ./test/test.js && cat test/sandbox/bundle.js | tape-run && rm -rf test/sandbox

author: Espen Klem
